name: Spicy Coleslaw
description: This easy, crisp slaw can be made a few hours ahead of time. It goes well with ribs and a cold beer, fried chicken or whatever summer feast sparks your fancy.
keywords: cabbage, carrot, mayonnaise, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons pepper sauce, like Frank’s, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cabbage in half and remove the core. Cut each half in half and slice each resulting quarter into thin ribbons. Mix with carrots in a large, nonreactive bowl.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the remaining ingredients.
Pour the dressing over the cabbage and toss. Season to taste.
The coleslaw may be covered with plastic wrap and refrigerated for a few hours. Toss again before serving.
